title: Appearance *automated*
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has obtained the current design reference with all of the approved copy- see design link __https://zpl.io/bzljm3V__
AND the user is viewing the Create Account Page via the __Login Page__
custom_steps: WHEN observing the Create Account Page
custom_expected: THEN all design and all copy appear as expected

title: Free Account - Email Address length
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to Settings AND sees a Create FREE account button AND selects/activates it AND selects/activates 'Email Address' field
custom_expected: THEN the user can enter an email address 32 characters in length or more

title: Create Free MLB.TV account - opt in newsletter
custom_preconds:
GIVEN  the Freshly installed app is launched
AND User is not logged in
AND User has advanced through Onboarding flow to Create Account page
AND User has a test email account that can be accessed
custom_steps:
WHEN we enter an email address 
AND create a PW 8-15 characters in length with at least one upper-case letter, one lowercase letter and one number 
AND confirm password
custom_expected: THEN the app logs the user in AND advances to the In-Game alerts page AND the user's email account is set to receive the newsletter To confirm this, user must contact CDQA memeber with Rodeo access (Crabtree/LaSan) asking them to confirm that it has been tagged with opt-in group “428”

title: Create Account Failure - Invalid Email Format
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Freshly installed app is launched
User is not logged in
User has advanced through Onboarding flow to Create Account Page
custom_steps: WHEN we enter an invalid email format (e.g. "hello.me@com") AND any password 8-15 Characters in length & proper format (one number/upper-case letter/lower-case letter) AND we activate Create Account
custom_expected:
THEN the app shows an error overlay: _Invalid Email - Please enter a valid email address_ 
AND this can be dismissed 
AND the user is returned to Create Account Page

title: Create Account Failure - Invalid Password - Length
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Freshly installed app is launched
User is not logged in
User has advanced through Onboarding flow to Create Account Page
custom_steps:
WHEN we enter a valid email address 
AND any password in violation of the requirements - 8-15 Characters in length, one number, at least one upper-case & one lower-case letter 
AND we activate Create Account
custom_expected:
THEN the app shows an error overlay for length violation: _Password Length - Password must be at least 8 and no more than 15 characters_ 
AND this can be dismissed 
AND the user is returned to Create Account Page

title: Create Account Failure - Invalid Password - Bad Forma
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Freshly installed app is launched
User is not logged in
User has advanced through Onboarding flow to Create Account Page
custom_steps: WHEN we enter a valid email address AND any password 8-15 Characters in length BUT in violation of the requirements (missing requirement of one number, at least one upper-case & one lower-case letter) AND we activate Create Account
custom_expected: THEN the app shows an error overlay for length violation: _Password too simple - Password must at east one character, one number, one uppercase letter and one lowercase letter_ AND this can be dismissed AND the user is returned to Create Account Page

title: Create Account Failure - Existing Account
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Freshly installed app is launched
User is not logged in
User has advanced through Onboarding flow to Create Account Page
AND the user has a pre-registered MLB.com account ready
custom_steps:
WHEN we enter an existing MLB.com email 
AND any password 8-15 Characters in length & proper format (one number/upper-case letter/lower-case letter) 
AND we activate Create Account
custom_expected:
THEN the app shows an error overlay: "An error occurred - An account with this email address already exists." 
AND this can be dismissed 
AND the user is returned to Create Account Page

title: Cancel
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a freshly installed app is launched
AND the user is not logged in
AND the user has advanced through Onboarding flow to Login page
AND has activated the Create a FREE MLB.com account button
custom_expected: THEN we return to the Log In Page

title: Back via Menu
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user is viewing the Create a Free MLB.com account page
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the Menu button on the tvOS remote
custom_expected: THEN the app jumps back to the Log In page
